statusLine.command: input=$(cat); dir=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); if cd "$dir" 2>/dev/null; then branch=$(git --no-optional-locks branch --show-current 2>/dev/null || echo ''); if [ -n "$branch" ]; then git_status=$(git --no-optional-locks status --porcelain 2>/dev/null); if [ -n "$git_status" ]; then status_indicator="*"; else status_indicator=""; fi; printf "\033[2m%s @ %s [%s%s]\033[0m" "$(basename "$dir")" "$model" "$branch" "$status_indicator"; else printf "\033[2m%s @ %s\033[0m" "$(basename "$dir")" "$model"; fi; else printf "\033[2m%s @ %s\033[0m" "$(basename "$dir")" "$model"; fi
